title: Simulation/VR-Based Workshop to Strengthen Military Team Training Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic military training procedures and team dynamics
context.additional_context: Training methodology acquisition and simulation tool proficiency enhancement for team training design targeting in-service professionals

learning_goals: Acquire proficiency in applying structured frameworks for team task analysis
Design and evaluate team training scenarios tailored to military contexts
Enhance the ability to integrate team interaction elements in simulation/VR environments
Develop and implement feedback mechanisms to strengthen team capabilities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
